alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A nearly stationary thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lee, southwestern Wake and southeastern Chatham Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a slow, nearly stationary thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Pittsboro. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Heavy rain of 2 to 3 inches and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shearon Harris Reservoir, New Hill, Harris Lake Boat Launch, Moncure and Jordan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rain can be expected due to the slow movement of this storm. Prolonged heavy rain will result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks and streams. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
